nodes.text: Joel Carroll is an artist who illustrated two supplements to Star Wars: The Roleplaying Game by West End Games: Wretched Hives of Scum & Villainy and The Black Sands of Socorro. He also contributed illustrations to the "Wind Raiders of Taloraan" written by James L. Cambias, found in the Star Wars Adventure Journal Vol.1 No.5.
Joel contributed sketch-cards to both the Clone Wars ( http://www.joelcarroll.com/cards/cw.htm) and Star Wars Galaxies 4 ( http://www.joelcarroll.com/cards/swg.htm ) card sets in 2008 and early 2009.
Joel also co-hosts a Star Wars podcast entitled The Voice of the Republic.
